passage.title: Philippine Biodiversity
passage.text: The Philippines is known for its rich biodiversity. Its forests are home to many unique plants and animals. However, deforestation continues to threaten this natural wealth.

questions.text: What is the main idea of the passage?
questions.explanation: The passage highlights that biodiversity is threatened by deforestation.

choices.text: Forests in the Philippines are being replanted.
Animals in the Philippines are extinct.

questions.explanation: ‘Biodiversity’ refers to the variety of living organisms in a certain area.

questions.text: Which statement best expresses the author’s tone?
questions.explanation: The author expresses concern over the loss of biodiversity.
